dct_title_s: Sketch map of Perak and adjacent native states to illustrate the paper by W. Barrington D'Almeida
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. British possessions [Malacca, Tulu Saggar or False Dinding, Wellesley Province, and Pulo Penang] colored red. Perak, Quedah, Salangore, and consituent territories of Nigri Simbilan are shown. From: The Journal of the Royal Geographical Society of London. Vol. 46 (1876), pp. 357-80; held in Firestone Library. Call number: G7 .J687 v. 46 1876
